Topic.Title: Interesting item regarding pay for volunteer fire fighters.

Message.Msg: I and my dad volunteered for a large fire in San Diego County in 1950. Most volunteers then were White. They paid promptly for 8-10 days work. I'm sure that these people of whatever stripe would like their pay which they are entitled to.

Topic.Title: Obama wants your gun

Message.Msg: And the benefit to the U.S. for any of these trips has been????? The actions of the President and Congress are to be first and foremost in the best interests of the United States of America. If these trips have benefited the U.S. in some economic fashion such as increased trade, it can be measured. If it is simply a political trip that will do nothing more than create a desire for more of these local resident to immigrate here, we likely have all we can use thank you. A good number of these African countries are Islamic majorities; most Islamic saturated nations hate us and will after such an expensive trip. Invite the leaders of their countries to visit here. That will not only be significantly less expensive, but it will give them first hand information on what America is really like. If we want them to trade with us, they only need to know the economic advantages for their country to make a decision. These trips were and will be a complete waste of taxpayer dollars, time, and energy. This country's economy still needs significant improvements, our jobs totals need to increase dramatically. Our IRS and Justice departments are loose cannons along with the NSA. Immigration is a national debate and issue today. Why isn't he staying home and fixing America first?

Topic.Title: Obama wants your gun

Message.Msg: Simple deflection. It we are talking about his expensive trips, which the family doesn't need to be part of, we are not talking about the other issues...IRS, the AG, the NSA, immigration, Congressional spending, Obamacare and all of its attendant problems and issues. It is his brand of leadership...give good speeches and as far away from Washington as possible as often as possible. Trip schedules are his pretext for not spending time cultivating relationships in Congress that might lead to actions that in reality might be in the best interest of this country. He is the Master of Deflection; he is more proficient at deflection than even Ricky and/or Sir Echo.

Topic.Title: Interesting item regarding pay for volunteer fire fighters.

Topic.Title: Obama admin denies aid to West Texas blast victims

Message.Msg: Sorry, but this was not a natural disaster for which no one is directly responsible. This was an explosion caused by a fire at a privately owned and assumed to be insured business. The first recourse is the insurance company and those that owned the business. The city might be able to then obtain so low interest loans to repair public facilities, but as for the home and other business owners, the owners of the plant that exploded and their insurance carriers are on that hook.

Topic.Title: Fair Tax Originator dies

Message.Msg: I am for a flat tax (not fair tax) flat tax NO EXEMPTIONS for no one at no time. If your co has a business meeting in Vegas just pay the bill or stay home. If you buy 10 jets just pay the tax and go all you want. If you are going to start rebait tax and exemptions may leave what we have. The flat tax is added in now at the cash register for employee - fed - state -local and all other, but the big boys get their loophole and write off.

Topic.Title: Interesting item regarding pay for volunteer fire fighters.

Message.Msg: Volunteers, volunteer to give up days, nights and weekends to remain near the fire station to be available if a call comes in for which they then get paid to respond to the station and the incident as opposed to full time fire fighters who get paid to sit and sleep at the station waiting for calls.
